checked expr   : length<Binary>(to_binary<String>("latin"))
optimized expr : 5_u64
output type    : UInt64
output domain  : {5..=5}
output         : 5

optimized expr : "Abc"
output type    : String
output domain  : {"Abc"..="Abc"}
